title: 5.The Life of Maharana Pratap
description: The story of a courageous king who fought against the Mughal invasion to protect his homeland.

content.text: Maharana Pratap was raised in the battlefield. From a young age, he trained rigorously in the art of war, preparing to defend Mewar.

content.text: When the Mughal forces led by Akbar threatened Mewar, Maharana Pratap refused to bow down and led his forces into battle.
